Lab.Description: In this lab, you will take a photo application and add touch support ranging from simple taps to panning, dragging and pinch-zoom gestures. You will also implement a WinRT component (written in C++) and call it from Javascript (or C#).
Lab.Title: Touch Input and Hybrid apps

Property.Name: LongDescription
Property.Value: In this lab, you will implement touch input for your Metro app.
